thread.section_title: Smashinn opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Smashinn | www.smashinn.com
thread.title: W. Van De Ridder
thread.title_full: Smashinn evaluado por W. Van De Ridder

author: W. Van De Ridder
title: W. Van De Ridder
text:
Tennis shoes were ordered and paid for @ 27 Jan, after 3 weeks no sign of the shoes. Nobody seemed to know where they were. Called them and finally heard that they weren't available anymore. Which is strange, since Smashinn is still advertising heavily for the same shoe on Google. And you can still pay them directly.
Hope to get my money back now, which they confirmed. But to me, this feels pretty weird.
